statements: SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, department FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT researcher_name, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE DATE(date_reported) = '2022-11-30';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY researcher_name ASC, date_reported DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT researcher_name, department, research_topic FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE research_topic LIKE '%health%'
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY date_reported DESC
SELECT researcher_name, department, research_topic FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE department IN ('Research', 'Development')
SELECT researcher_name as 'Researcher Name', department as 'Department', research_topic as 'Research Topic' FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY researcher_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ethics_review_board;
SELECT researcher_name, department FROM ethics_review_board;
SELECT id, researcher_name, department, conflict_description FROM ethics_review_board ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ethics_review_board WHERE department = 'Psychology';
SELECT researcher_name, conflict_description FROM ethics_review_board WHERE id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, department FROM ethics_review_board WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM ethics_review_board WHERE researcher_name='John Doe' AND department='Research';
SELECT conflict_description, researcher_name FROM ethics_review_board WHERE department='IT' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, department, conflict_description FROM ethics_review_board WHERE conflict_description LIKE '%bias%' AND department='Management' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT id, status, review_date FROM conflict_status WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY status ASC, review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest;
SELECT researcher_name, research_project FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University of ABC';
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT board_name, board_email FROM review_board;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT researcher_name, research_project FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT research_project, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice Smith' AND research_project LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT * FROM researchers r JOIN conflicts_of_interest c ON r.researcher_name = c.researcher_name WHERE r.institution = 'University XYZ';
SELECT c.researcher_name, r.email, rb.board_name FROM conflicts_of_interest c JOIN researchers r ON c.researcher_name = r.researcher_name JOIN review_board rb ON c.researcher_name = rb.board_name;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, researcher_name, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT employee_id, research_topic FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conflict_reviews WHERE review_result = 'Approved';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM conflicts_of_interest ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, conflict_description FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE research_topic LIKE '%health%' AND researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM conflict_reviews WHERE review_result = 'Approved' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, conflict_description, research_topic FROM conflicts_of_interest WHERE research_topic IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ethics_review_board;
SELECT id, researcher_id, conflict_type, date_reported FROM ethics_review_board;
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'ABC University';
SELECT conflict_description, date_added FROM conflicts WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM review_status ORDER BY date_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University X';
SELECT name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University Y' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT r.name, i.location FROM researchers r JOIN institutions i ON r.institution = i.name WHERE i.location = 'City A';
SELECT r.name, c.conflict_description FROM researchers r JOIN conflicts c ON r.id = c.researcher_id WHERE c.date_added >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT rs.status, cs.date_updated FROM review_status rs JOIN conflicts cs ON rs.conflict_id = cs.id WHERE rs.status = 'Pending' ORDER BY cs.date_added DESC;
